Salt_Lake_City.Eccles Broadcast Center: Eccles Broadcast Center, formally known as the Dolores Doré Eccles Broadcast Center, is headquarters of three broadcast stations and a statewide educational consortium. The center houses KUED, KUER, KUEN and the Utah Education Network. The facility sits on the southern edge of a nine-hole frisbee golf course on the University of Utah campus in Salt Lake City.
